{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=DPC3000 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B0047106KC |price= |est_release_date=02/2009 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pegatron |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETC4830 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= Cable Tuner;Microtune;MT2170;;1; ,,, Programmable Gain Amplifier (optimized for DOCSIS 3.0);Anadigics;ARA2017;; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.6.18; |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=54:D4:6F, 60:2A:D0 }} [http://www.usbjtag.com/jtagnt/modem/dpc3000.php ''DPC3000 Cable modem'' on '''usbjtag.com'''] :"PCB MADE IN CHINA" and a date code of '''0906''' (Feb. 2009) is silkscreened on the board. This is a presumed '''Pegatron''' manuf. device.
[http://d.hatena.ne.jp/UME/20090108 Boot log and an additional photo]
==Likely compatible services== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.comcast.net/device.php?devid=236 '''Comcast''' device database entry])
==Additional external links== *[http://cable-wizardz.co.uk/topic/4883-docsis-30-hack-forceware-v11-r12-firmware-download/ ''Docsis 3.0 Hack - Forceware V.1.1 R12 Firmware + Download'' on '''Cable-Wizardz.co.uk'''] :The DPC3000 is noted as using a MT2170 tuner + an '''Anadigics''' ARA2017 amplifier.
{{CableModemSpec |down_c=4 |up_c=4 }}
